snippet: In Illinois, the prospects for marriage equality will improve in the next legislative session.
abstract: Editorial observes that Illinois Legislature will begin its new session with chance to legalize gay marriage; contends it is likely to pass such legislation, due to fact that Democrats have supermajority.
lead_paragraph: In Illinois, the prospects for marriage equality will improve in the next legislative session.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
